casebody.data:
STATE EX REL. SNYDER
v.
BUTLER 2018-0647 Supreme Court of Ohio. August 1, 2018

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

MERIT DECISIONS WITHOUT OPINIONS

In Mandamus. On respondents' motions to dismiss. Motions granted. Cause dismissed. On relator's motion to strike. Motion denied. On motion of amicus curiae for leave to file a memorandum in support of relator's opposition to respondents' joint motion to dismiss. Motion denied. O'Donnell, Kennedy, French, Fischer, DeWine, and DeGenaro, JJ., concur. O'Connor, C.J., not participating.
